title: water_level_not_full_after_power_shutdown_fz_03_2026_02_01_1504
summary: Observed water level not full in storage tank after power shutdown in Zone FZ-03.
description: The internal water level of a storage tank in Zone FZ-03 was visually recorded at 2026-02-01 15:04 (Asia/Bangkok). The image shows the tank containing water below a full level following the shutdown of the power system.

event.action: Observed water level after power system shutdown.

reference_context.note: Observation recorded after power disconnection event.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
